name: The RailIdle
description:
The setting is a railroad shrine.
Choose one of the four apostles and off you go!

At the base location, you will mainly collect and manufacture materials by leaving the game alone.
Once materials are gathered, head into the adventure and use them to break through!

As you progress in your adventures,
you will have more friends to support you and you will be able to play side contents.

[Various functions and contents]


  • Basic functions to move around in JRPG style.
  • The base that gradually becomes more advantageous and convenient by acquiring treasures.
  • Unexplored areas that can be played by acquiring maps.
  • A group of people who will join you and help you in your base.
  • A challenging side trip area.
  • Extended areas that continue even after the main story is completed.
  • Endless looping content.
  • Random dungeon-like content
  • Support for Achievements

More to come in the future!
★Even a simple base at first becomes more and more luxurious as you acquire treasures!
★Seasonal event areas and more!
